title: 5K Runner: 0 to 5K in 8 Weeks
summary: Couch potato to 5K Runner ®. Get in shape in 8 weeks, with run - walk intervals
developerAddress: 20 HaMagshimim St, Petach Tikvah, POB 7233, ISRAEL
description: 5K Run Training for beginners: go from sitting on your couch to running 5K, losing weight and getting in great shape. 5K Runner is a guided training program that will get you in shape in only 8 weeks.  Its a Walk / Run inteval training program, guided by an audio coach. Just plug-in your headphones and the coach will tell you when to walk and when to run, helping you build stamina and get to 5K in 8 weeks.  5K Runner® is the most effective 5K run training app, and is highly recommended by health & fitness experts.FEATURES● 30 minutes, 3 times a week, 8 weeks● The easiest way to run 5K● Alternating walk / run intervals ● Outdoors or treadmill● Burn calories and lose weight● Audio coach tells you when to walk / run● Listen to your music and the run training coach will blend in ● Compatible with all music apps● Earn achievements & badges ● Great way to boost your cardio and get you ready for your first 5k race! ● The best & most effective 5K training appPRAISE & PRESS- 4.2 Million People successfully did it  - Awards: Best 5K Training App, Best Running App, Editor's Choice, Top fitness app, Best Beginner App, Top Quality App, Best fitness and nutrition apps. - Featured on CNN, Fox, USA Today, Times, Fitness Channel, AppAdvice, AppCraver, Best10Apps, Appolicious, Daily Motion, AppOfTheDay, MakeUseOf, the App Review, Remix Your Health, AppShopper, and so many others.- Recommended by doctors on healthTap.com★ 5K Runner community ★ https://www.facebook.com/fitness22.apps★ Our Fitness Blog ★ http://www.fitness22.com/blog----- CONTACT US -----Dear customers, we are here for you! descriptionHTML:
5K Run Training for beginners: go from sitting on your couch to running 5K, losing weight and getting in great shape.

5K Runner is a guided training program that will get you in shape in only 8 weeks. Its a Walk / Run inteval training program, guided by an audio coach. Just plug-in your headphones and the coach will tell you when to walk and when to run, helping you build stamina and get to 5K in 8 weeks. 5K Runner® is the most effective 5K run training app, and is highly recommended by health & fitness experts.

FEATURES
● 30 minutes, 3 times a week, 8 weeks
● The easiest way to run 5K
● Alternating walk / run intervals
● Outdoors or treadmill
● Burn calories and lose weight
● Audio coach tells you when to walk / run
● Listen to your music and the run training coach will blend in
● Compatible with all music apps
● Earn achievements & badges
● Great way to boost your cardio and get you ready for your first 5k race!
● The best & most effective 5K training app

PRAISE & PRESS
- 4.2 Million People successfully did it
- Awards: Best 5K Training App, Best Running App, Editor's Choice, Top fitness app, Best Beginner App, Top Quality App, Best fitness and nutrition apps.
- Featured on CNN, Fox, USA Today, Times, Fitness Channel, AppAdvice, AppCraver, Best10Apps, Appolicious, Daily Motion, AppOfTheDay, MakeUseOf, the App Review, Remix Your Health, AppShopper, and so many others.
- Recommended by doctors on healthTap.com

comments: During my free trial the app stopped twice. Once when I was halfway the second session, so I had to start all over; and another time at the last walk of W2D1. This really put me off progressing to a paid version. Will be looking for a different app.

It is a great program. I have a few of the apps they have and they are all great. I do not ise the tracking distance since it does not seem to track correctly, could be due to the constant cloud cover over my area. I also don't use gear so I cannot vouch for that aspect of the apps, though it does say it supports at least a few.  Being a former Marine coming off an injury they have helped me rehab nicely. Used these in the past to get me ready and stay ready for fitness tests. Only complaint is that now each one is pay to use and I can't do a bundle price. Is that something coming in the near future?

An excellent app; keeps instructions to a minimum and just a tiny bit of encouragement at the right moments. You can keep repeating a stage if you don't feel ready to move on, and the data on each run is brilliant.

I love this app, a friend recommended it, I wasn't intending to start running but the ease of it using this app and my friends inspired me. I am at the beginning and it is not easy for me but not too hard that I want to quit. My only issue is, it says there is a music icon so I can listen to music but I can't find it. Give it a try.

I began the program two days ago. As I am unfit, the first session pushed me just enough. It is motivating and well-planned. I definitely felt the burn the day after and left me looking forward to the next run!

Considering I haven't taken care of myself in... ever, I've figured; when better than now to start running. 5K Runner is just what I needed to get started, I really feel as though I'm getting precisely the right cardio workout for my current fitness level.
